    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsPoint(int x, int y)
      Returns whether the given point is in this view's bounds.
      Rect getControlBounds(int crossControl) 
      void getControlBounds(int crossControl, Rect result)
      Writes the bounds for the given cross control into the given rectangle.
      int getControlInCross(int x, int y)
      Get the cross control this point is on.

      Following values can be returned:
      - CROSS_OUTSIDE If the point is not inside the cross bounds at all.
      - CROSS_CONTROL_NONE If the point is inside the cross bounds but on none of the controls.
      - Otherwise one of the control codes CROSS_LEFT, CROSS_UP, CROSS_RIGHT, CROSS_DOWN.
      Rect getCrossBounds() 
      void getCrossBounds(Rect result)
      Writes the bounds of the cross into the given rectangle.

      • getControlInCross

        public int getControlInCross(int x,
                             int y)
        Description copied from interface: ICrossControlOverlayView
        Get the cross control this point is on.

        Following values can be returned:
        - CROSS_OUTSIDE If the point is not inside the cross bounds at all.
        - CROSS_CONTROL_NONE If the point is inside the cross bounds but on none of the controls.
        - Otherwise one of the control codes CROSS_LEFT, CROSS_UP, CROSS_RIGHT, CROSS_DOWN.
        Specified by:
        getControlInCross in interface ICrossControlOverlayView
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal value of the point.
        y - The vertical value of the point.
        Returns:
        The code of the cross control this point is on.

        Description copied from interface: IUIOverlayView
        Returns whether the given point is in this view's bounds.
        Specified by:
        containsPoint in interface IUIOverlayView
        Parameters:
        x - The horizontal value of the point.
        y - The vertical value of the point.
        Returns:
        True if this view contains the point, false if not.
